sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from etb_barcode_log T where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.batchno = #batchno#
T.barcode = #barcode#
T.barcodetype = #barcodetype#
T.operatetype = #operatetype#

select count(*) from etb_barcode_log T where 1 = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.batchno = #batchno#
T.barcode = #barcode#
T.barcodetype = #barcodetype#
T.operatetype = #operatetype#
order by T.updatedate desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select T.* from etb_barcode_log T where 1 = 1 and T.status = 1
T.productid = #productid#
T.batchno = #batchno#
T.barcodetype = #barcodetype#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into etb_barcode_log(belongto,productid,batchno,barcode,barcodeno,scanno,barcodetype,quantity, operatetype,note,status,res01,res02,res03,res04,res05,createuid,createdate,updateuid,updatedate) values(#belongto#,#productid#,#batchno#,#barcode#,#barcodeno#,#scanno#,#barcodetype#,#quantity#, #operatetype#,#note#,#status#,#res01#,#res02#,#res03#,#res04#,#res05#,#createuid#,NOW(),#updateuid#,NOW())
select LAST_INSERT_ID() as value
sqlMap.update: update etb_barcode_log set barcode = #barcode#, barcodeno = #barcodeno#, scanno = #scanno#, barcodetype = #barcodetype#, quantity = #quantity#, operatetype = #operatetype#, note = #note#, status = #status#, res01 = #res01#, res02 = #res02#, res03 = #res03#, res04 = #res04#, res05 = #res05#, updateuid = #updateuid#, updatedate = NOW() where id = #id#
